five_acts.build: Introduced a versioned migration framework: numbered scripts under migrations/v{semver}/ with a check()/migrate() contract, an atomic-write state file for resumability, and a pure-stdlib runner that orders and applies migrations from any version range.
five_acts.gauntlet: Approved in round 1 with no critical findings. Three important findings (untested edge-case paths) deferred to next cycle per reviewer recommendation.
five_acts.numbers: 6 new files, 602 lines, 178 new tests, 2290 total passing. Zero external dependencies.
five_acts.whats_next: Enables deployment-channels and deployment-cleanup phases. The migration contract is now the foundation for any future schema or config evolution in the deployment pipeline.
